content: *this beautiful baby afghan features a lovely diamond bobble pattern yarnspirations * skill level intermediate materials bernat® baby coordinates 160 g/5 6 oz **6 balls** size 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge pattern 12-row repeat ed note uses treble stitches to make fatter bobbles this is not the same pattern as the blue blanket with bear although it looks very similar the bobble stitches are different english pdf modified july 11 2007 bobble crochet afghan 1 french pdf modified july 11 2007 afghan à mouchets au crochet 2 spanish pdf modified july 11 2007 cobija estilo afgano baby coordinates a ganchillo 3 1 http //www yarnspirations com/assets/files/pattern-files/pdf/bernat_babycoordinates001_cr_afghan en_us pdf 2 http //www yarnspirations com/assets/files/pattern-files/pdf/bernat_babycoordinates001_cr_afghan fr_ca pdf 3 http //www yarnspirations com/assets/files/pattern-files/pdf/bernat_babycoordinates001_cr_afghan es_mx pdf
